DOC.brief_summary: Normal value measurement high resolution manometry protocol include isolated liquid swallow upright recumbent position , free drinking water , solid test meal postprandial observational period determine .
DOC.brief_title: Normal Values Esophageal High Resolution Manometry Advanced Protocol Including Liquid Swallows Solid Test Meal
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator recruit healthy volunteer ask study participation . After provide informed consent , participant question use standardized questionnaire assess symptom reflux , dysphagia , gastrointestinal symptom burden depression . Participants test use advanced protocol high resolution esophageal manometry . This protocol include individual liquid swallow , free drinking water , standardize test meal ( 200g rice ) postprandial observational period . Normal value liquid solid swallow determine .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer without gastrointestinal comorbidity Inability unwillingness provide inform consent Any relevant current past gastrointestinal morbidity ( include disease relevant previous surgery ) . Relevant gastrointestinal symptom Relevant medication ( specify ) within last 4 week Age 18 year
